questions.question: What is the predominant color of the container's label?
What is the overall shape of the product container?
What material appears to constitute the primary container?
What color is the text prominently displayed on the label?
Describing the texture of the container's surface, is it smooth or rough?
What type of closure is visibly present on the container's opening?
What is the most noticeable feature on the product's label?
Is there a significant graphic element, besides text, on the container?
What color are the smaller text details on the label?
Considering the container's size, is it small, medium, or large?
Does the label exhibit a glossy or matte finish?
What is the apparent condition of the container's label?
Can you identify any visible barcodes or other markings?
Is the container transparent or opaque?
What is the apparent weight of the filled container?
